Services & Pricing

Professional services for your health and wellbeing

Pravilo Sessions

Discovery Session

Perfect for First-Time Clients. Your introduction to the world of Pravilo. This comprehensive session includes a detailed consultation to understand your goals, a full warm-up, a guided decompression experience, and a personal plan for moving forward.

What's included:

  • 90-Minute Total Experience
  • Personal Health & Posture Assessment
  • Guided Pravilo Decompression
  • Post-Session Integration & Recommendations
Book Your First Session

The Alignment Package

Our Recommended Path for Lasting Results. Commit to meaningful change. This package of five sessions allows your body to adapt, release deep-seated tension, and build foundational strength. Ideal for addressing specific issues and creating lasting postural improvements.

What's included:

  • Five 75-Minute Sessions
  • Progressive Strength & Flexibility Program
  • Ongoing Progress Tracking
  • Priority Booking
Begin Your Alignment

Single Session

For Returning Clients. A single, focused session to maintain your progress, work through a specific tension point, or simply as a powerful tune-up for your body and mind. Available after completing a Discovery Session.

What's included:

  • 75-Minute Total Experience
  • Targeted Warm-up & Decompression
  • Perfect for Maintenance
Schedule a Session

How a session works

1

Consultation

Discussion of your goals, issues, and expectations. Assessment of current health and posture.

2

Warm-up

Preparing the body for decompression through special exercises and breathing techniques.

3

Decompression

Main work on the Pravilo simulator under the guidance of an experienced instructor.

4

Integration

Time for recovery and discussion of sensations. Recommendations for home practice.

Session Results

Immediate Effects

  • Relief from back and neck tension
  • Improved posture
  • Increased flexibility
  • Deep relaxation

Long-term Results

  • Improved circulation
  • Strengthened core muscles
  • Reduced chronic pain
  • Increased energy

Who it's for

  • Office workers
  • Athletes
  • People with back issues
  • Anyone wanting better health

Ready to begin?
